file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SUPER SPECIAL SUMMER BIRTHDAY LIVE! #KiaraBDay2025 [f-UbyQUUykE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the performance of 'UNDEAD (English Version)'.
Short transition with audience applause and stage lighting changes.
Performance of the song 'Pikkan!' (ビッカーン！) with special guests.
